speaker: Doctor
text: "DIAGNOSIS READY: Eczema_Asthma complex, also known as atopic dermatitis, with possible underlying asthma or allergic rhinitis. The rash on your trunk and extremities, combined with the facial rash and nasal discharge, suggests an allergic reaction. The fact that you're experiencing a pruritic rash, fever, and rhinorrhea, along with a history of low-grade fever, suggests a possible allergic response. I'd like to run some further tests to confirm this diagnosis and rule out other conditions. I'll also discuss some treatment options with you and your parents.
